# Load in packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
# Load in data
```{r}
accuracies <- read_csv("../data/accuracies.csv")
data <- read_csv("../data/paper_data_streamlined.csv")

dummy <- runif(length(accuracies$accuracy), min = min(accuracies$accuracy, max = max(accuracies$accuracy)))

accuracies <- cbind(accuracies, dummy)
```
# Draw density plot
```{r}
accuracies %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(x = accuracy), fill ="cornflowerblue", color = "white", alpha = 0.9) +
  geom_density(aes(x = dummy), fill ="cornsilk", color = "white", alpha = 0.9) +
  #geom_vline(xintercept = mean(accuracies$accuracy), linetype = "dotted")+

  theme_classic() 

#mean(accuracies$accuracy)

```
